descriptionHtml:
===============
DESCRIPTION
===============
This mod add Estin   - Demon
He was in Oblivion during many years but when he returned he
changed , his body with tatooes and his eyes became red
He was human  but  when he was turned in Oblivion he became 
Daedra-like but his brain and memory saved andhe returned
to Riften but his parents died and he went to Bee and Barb.
During living in Riften Bee and Barb he improved his skills 
he is master of 2H 1H weapons , Block , Bow and heavy armor
You can find him in locked room in Bee and Barb (Riften)


FULLY STANDALONE NO OTHER MODS REQD!

===========
INSTALL
===========
Put in Data folder

============
UNINSTALL
============
Delete esp
author: Den987
